pages.text: The base tablet used for all the tablet types.

pages.title: Tablet of Recall
pages.text: Used to teleport back to the grave it was activated by$(br2)Use on a soul to set that grave as your return point.$(br2)Use the tablet again when its glowing to teleport you back to that grave.

pages.title: Tablet of Home
pages.text: Used to teleport to your respawn point$(br2)Use on a soul to activate the tablet.$(br2)Use the tablet again when its glowing to teleport.

pages.title: Tablet of Assistance
pages.text: Used to teleport to another player$(br2)Use on a soul to activate the tablet, then use on an anvil with grave dust and write the player's name.

pages.title: Tablet of Cupidity
pages.text: Teleports you to a dungeon. (Be prepared!)$(br2)Use on a soul to activate the tablet$(br2)Use the tablet again when its glowing to teleport.

pages.title: Lost Tablet
pages.text: This tablet can only be found through unlucky fishing.$(br2)Use on a soul to activate the tablet when the tablet has found a nearby structure.$(br2)Use the tablet again when its glowing to teleport.$(br2)The tablet may break into dust after searching for too long.
